.gitignore:
# Gem files
*.gem
*.rbc
.bundle
.config
vendor/bundle/

# Documentation
/.yardoc
/_yardoc/
/doc/
/rdoc/

# Test results
/coverage/
/InstalledFiles
/pkg/
/spec/reports/
/test/tmp/
/test/version_tmp/
/tmp/

# RVM / rbenv
.ruby-version
.ruby-gemset

# IDE
.vscode/
.idea/
*.swp
*.swo
*~

# OS
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db
main.rb:
require_relative 'data/data'
require_relative 'tool/tool'

puts 'Hello, World!'

tool = Tool.new
data = Data.new
data/data.rb:
class Data
  # Your data class
end
tool/tool.rb:
class Tool
  # Your tool class
end
Gemfile:
source 'https://rubygems.org'

ruby '>= 3.0.0'

# Add your gems here
